name: likewise
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: Just water these plants twice a week, and likewise the ones in the bedroom.
example.egtrans: 这些植物一周浇两次水，卧室里的那些也一样。

example.eg: "I don't have time to spend hours preparing one dish!" "Likewise (= it's the same for me)."
example.egtrans: “我没有功夫花好几个小时去做一个菜！”“我也一样。”
